title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 508.4 - Decision
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 508.4 - Decision

State Regulations

Permission to become a self-insurer will be granted, with
or without a hearing, if the carrier establishes that it has the capability to
adjust and pay any and all insurance obligations or has been authorized by the

Federal Motor Carrier Safety Administration to become a
self-insurer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
508.4

Amended

New

York State Register February 1, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 05, eff. 2/1/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
